Package it.unipr.sowide.actosis.automata

Class Cell<S extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
      • it.unipr.sowide.actosis.automata.Cell<S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alive, Dead
    public abstract class Cell<S extends java.io.Serializable>
extends Behavior
    The Cell interface defines a partial implementation of a behavior of an automata cell actor.
    See Also:
